lead_paragraph: A filmic essay in five parts, here we dissect the experience of asylum seekers in Cyprus: a PLO activist in exile from Iraq is denied asylum within 15 minutes, neo-Nazi fundamentalists roam the streets in an attack on Muslim migrants, activists and academics organize an anti-Fascist rally and clash with the neo-Nazis, and 195 migrants drown in the Mediterranean.
